page.title: 05Recreation
page.content: Due to the fact that most of our residents travel a considerable distance to and from work they are content to avail themselves of the considerable local facilities. The most popular of these are the swimming pool,the golf course, the squash courts,the bowling greens and the tennis courts. During the winter months there are a wide variety of clubs available to suit all age groups and tastes e.g. wine club,musical society,jazz club, bridge clubs,as well as numerous clubs attached to local churches and schools.The local authority also provide a wide range of evening classes both educational and aesthetic. Two recreation parks provide scope for creative youngsters and there are plenty walks for nature lovers.
